sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbackupopert ( BACKUP_OPERT_ID /* */ , BACKUP_OPERT_NM /* */ , BACKUP_ORGINL_DRCTRY /* */ , BACKUP_STRE_DRCTRY /* */ , CMPRS_SE /* */ , EXECUT_CYCLE /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_HOUR /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_MNT /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_SECND /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #backupOpertId# /* */ , #backupOpertNm# /* */ , #backupOrginlDrctry# /* */ , #backupStreDrctry# /* */ , #cmprsSe# /* */ , #executCycle# /* */ , #executSchdulDe# /* */ , #executSchdulHour# /* */ , #executSchdulMnt# /* */ , #executSchdulSecnd# /* */ , #useAt# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbackupopert SET BACKUP_OPERT_ID=#backupOpertId# /* */ , BACKUP_OPERT_NM=#backupOpertNm# /* */ , BACKUP_ORGINL_DRCTRY=#backupOrginlDrctry# /* */ , BACKUP_STRE_DRCTRY=#backupStreDrctry# /* */ , CMPRS_SE=#cmprsSe# /* */ , EXECUT_CYCLE=#executCycle# /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE=#executSchdulDe# /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_HOUR=#executSchdulHour# /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_MNT=#executSchdulMnt# /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_SECND=#executSchdulSecnd# /* */ , USE_AT=#useAt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE BACKUP_OPERT_ID=#backupOpertId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT BACKUP_OPERT_ID /* */ , BACKUP_OPERT_NM /* */ , BACKUP_ORGINL_DRCTRY /* */ , BACKUP_STRE_DRCTRY /* */ , CMPRS_SE /* */ , EXECUT_CYCLE /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_HOUR /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_MNT /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_SECND /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnbackupopert WHERE BACKUP_OPERT_ID=#backupOpertId# /* */

SELECT BACKUP_OPERT_ID /* */ , BACKUP_OPERT_NM /* */ , BACKUP_ORGINL_DRCTRY /* */ , BACKUP_STRE_DRCTRY /* */ , CMPRS_SE /* */ , EXECUT_CYCLE /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_HOUR /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_MNT /* */ , EXECUT_SCHDUL_SECND /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnbackupopert WHERE 1=1
BACKUP_OPERT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
BACKUP_OPERT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY BACKUP_OPERT_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnbackupopert WHERE 1=1
BACKUP_OPERT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
BACKUP_OPERT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
